com.epimorphics.lda.query

Class ContextQueryUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epimorphics.lda.query.ContextQueryUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewSetter

    public class ContextQueryUpdater
extends Object
implements ViewSetter
    A ContextQueryUpdater is used to update an APIQuery according to context parameters, including geospatial ones, and to deliver the view specified by the context.
    Author:
    chris

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContextQueryUpdater

        public ContextQueryUpdater(int endpointKind,
                   Bindings context,
                   NamedViews nv,
                   ShortnameService sns,
                   APIQuery args)
        Initialise this ContextQueryUpdater.
        Parameters:
        context - the context providing the parameters and their values
        nv - a mapping from names to views, with a default
        sns - the ShortnameService to use to translate to URIs
        eps - possibly dead: expansion points
        args - place to build the query arguments

    • Method Detail

      • updateQueryAndConstructView

        public View updateQueryAndConstructView(List<PendingParameterValue> deferredFilters)
        Apply the context updates to the query, and answer the view specified.

      • handleReservedParameters

        public void handleReservedParameters(GEOLocation geo,
                            ViewSetter vs,
                            String p,
                            String val)
        handle the reserved, ie, _wossname, parameters. These may update the given geo, the vs, or this query object. p is the reserved-property name, val is the value string.

      • addFilterFromQuery

        public void addFilterFromQuery(Param param,
                      String raw_val)
        General interface for extending the query with a specified parameter. This parameter types handled include _page, _orderBy, min-, name- and path parameters.
